resources.string:
You will now be thrown into the battlefield filled with monsters placed on various locations. 


The battlefield is divided into fields (different colors) with monsters in different experience levels. 


Travel the battlefield to find the monsters and destroy them!

Follow the vibrations and press anywhere on the screen when the intensity is so high that you almost drop the phone. 


Get a damage bonus by aiming fast (keep an eye on the progress bar in the top of the screen). 


To perform the attack just swing your phone.
